android.manifestAdditions:
<manifest android:installLocation="auto"> <supports-screens android:anyDensity="true" android:largeScreens="true" android:normalScreens="true" android:smallScreens="true" />
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.VIBRATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="com.tencent.mtt.extension.Player" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_FIND_LOCATION" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCESSES" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.SYSTEM_OVERLAY_WINDOW" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INSTALL_PACKAGES" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.RECEIVE_SMS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_SMS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_SMS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.SEND_SMS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.webkit.permission.PLUGIN" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_SETTINGS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYSTEMS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.GET_TASKS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_LOGS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.DOWNLOAD_WITHOUT_NOTIFICATION" />
<uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="8" android:targetSdkVersion="17" />
<application android:allowBackup="true" >
<activity android:name="com.unionpay.uppay.PayActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.alipay.sdk.app.H5PayActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|navigation" android:exported="false" android:screenOrientation="behind" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.alipay.sdk.app.H5AuthActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|navigation" android:exported="false" android:screenOrientation="behind" > </activity>
<!-- 初始化界面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.LogoActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:theme="@style/mydialog" > <meta-data android:name="ANZHIUSERCENTE_VERSIONS" android:value="3.5.2" > </meta-data> </activity>
<!-- 个人资料详情页 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.UserCenterMainActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.ipaynow.plugin.activity.PayMethodActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:exported="false" android:screenOrientation="portrait" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Dialog" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.ipaynow.plugin.inner_plugin.wechat_plugin.activity.WeChatNotifyActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.NoDisplay" > </activity>
<!-- 个人中心页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.UserDetailActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity>
<!-- 星座页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.UpdateStarActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" > </activity>
<!-- 更新QQ号页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.UpdateQQActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" > </activity>
<!-- 更新昵称页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.UpdateNickActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" > </activity>
<!-- 设置支付密码页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.PwdSettingActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity>
<!-- 消息页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.AnzhiMessageActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity>
<!-- 密码设置清除页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.PwdSettingClearActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity>
<!-- 账号安全页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.AccountSafeActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden" > </activity> <!-- 绑定手机页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.BindTelActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity> <!-- 解绑手机号页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.UnbindTelActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity>
<!-- 安智币充值页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.CurrencyChargeWebViewActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity>
<!-- 消费充值记录历史页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.ConsumHistoryWebViewActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity>
<!-- 充值页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.GameChargeWebViewActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity>
<!-- 客服页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.FeedbackWebViewActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity>
<!-- qq登录页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.OpenLoginforQQActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity>
<!-- 微博登录页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.OpenLoginforWeiboActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity>
<!-- 绑定邮箱页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.BindEmailActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity>
<!-- 解绑邮箱页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.UnbindEmailActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity>
<!-- 消息详情页 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.MessageDetailsActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity>
<!-- 账号安全弹窗 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.AccountSafeWindowActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:theme="@style/mydialog" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity>
<!-- qq绑定引导页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.QQbindGuideActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:theme="@style/mydialog" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity>
<!-- 升级更新页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.UpdateActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:theme="@style/mydialog" > </activity>
<!-- 静态网页 页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.NoticeActivtiy" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:theme="@style/Transparent" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity>
<!-- 等待页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.LoadingActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Translucent.NoTitleBar.Fullscreen" > </activity>
<!-- vip 页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.VipActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity>
<!-- 礼包详情页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.GiftDetailsActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" > </activity>
<!-- web页面查看大图 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.BigPtictureWebActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Black.NoTitleBar.Fullscreen" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.LoginFailDailogActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:theme="@style/mydialog" > </activity> <!-- 攻略列表 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.StrategyActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <!-- 我的反馈列表 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.MyFeedbackActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity>
<!-- VIP反馈界面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.VipFeedbackActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity>
<!-- 在线反馈界面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.OnlineFeedbackActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity>
<!-- 礼包列表页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.GiftBagActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity>
<!-- 礼包详情页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.GiftDetailActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" > </activity> <!-- 所有礼包页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.MoreGiftbagActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" > </activity>
<!-- =====================================华丽的分割线======================================== --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.ModifyPwdActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.ResetPwdActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.FindAccountFailActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.NoticeDetailActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden|adjustPan" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.AnzhiGameBbsActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.RechargeRedPacketWebActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.GiftBagDetailActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.MessageActivitty" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.GiftbagRecordActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.GiftDetailsActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" > </activity>
<!-- 退出游戏广告页 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.OutGameAdActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:theme="@style/mydialog" > </activity> <!-- 新登录界面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.NewLoginActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:theme="@style/mydialog" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.RegisterActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:theme="@style/mydialog" > </activity>
<!-- web找回密码页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.ForgetPwdwebActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" > </activity> <!-- web注册页面 --> <activity android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.WebRegisterActivity" android:configChanges="keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" > </activity>
<receiver android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.control.NetListenerReceiver" > <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.net.conn.CONNECTIVITY_CHANGE" /> </intent-filter> </receiver> <receiver android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.DownloadReceiver" > <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.DOWNLOAD_COMPLETE" /> <action android:name="android.intent.action.DOWNLOAD_NOTIFICATION_CLICKED" /> </intent-filter> </receiver>
<service android:name="com.alipay.android.app.MspService" android:exported="false" android:process="com.alipay.sdk" > <intent-filter android:priority="800" /> </service> <service android:name="com.anzhi.usercenter.sdk.AppControlService" android:process="com.anzhi.ucenter.background" > </service>
<!-- 配置渠道初始化参数, 如果在代码中也传递了参数，优先取代码中参数 init start--> <meta-data android:name="appKey" android:value="1378375366Az26xatNyDOD5EM6D2ys" > </meta-data> <meta-data android:name="appSecret" android:value="ug2KMdLi2JSr4naOE48XmL3h" > </meta-data> <!-- 0 横屏,1 竖屏,4 根据物理感应来选择方向 --> <meta-data android:name="orientation" android:value="1" > </meta-data> <meta-data android:name="sdkLog" android:value="true" > </meta-data> <!-- init end -->
</application> </manifest>
